# resident or native of the [[Nord-Pas-de-Calais]] region of France, especially a person who speaks [[Picard]]
types.html:
Chti m or f by sense (plural Chtis)

  1. resident or native of the Nord-Pas-de-Calais region of France, especially a person who speaks Picard
trans: resident or native of the Nord-Pas-de-Calais region of France, especially a person who speaks Picard
